data.eml:eml: Systematics of Nothopsini (Serpentes, Dipsadidae), with a new species of Synophis from the Pacific Andean slopes of southwestern Ecuador

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pyron, R. Alexander, Guayasamin, Juan M., Penafiel, Nicolas, Bustamante, Lucas, Arteaga, Alejandro (2015): Systematics of Nothopsini (Serpentes, Dipsadidae), with a new species of Synophis from the Pacific Andean slopes of southwestern Ecuador. ZooKeys 541: 109-147, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.541.6058, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.541.6058
